message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get it at a special price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $120.
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
I understand that $120 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $105.
I appreciate the compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $95. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is the minimum I'm willing to sell it for. This is my final counteroffer.
